name: Geomatry Shap
description: Player have to control a Geomatry to avoid obstacle , but "Only one"Geomatry can move at the time,i think this game maybe to short but i will consider to at more level in the future ,tell me what u guys think about it (to easy,to hard).This game was submited for the GMTK 2019 ,indeed it was a exoerience for me ,thank for Mark Brown to made this possiple ,enjoy the game  guys
